description:
A 3-pack of compact walkie talkies that will help you and your family stay connected. FRS walkie talkies let you stay in contact even when you don’t have cell signal. With a range of up to 26km and 22 different channels, Cobra’s ACXT145 FRS radios make communication easy on the trail, around camp or when travelling – even on a cruise ship. The compact design fits in a pocket and the rechargeable batteries last a full day.

  • 26km range (in ideal conditions) gives you plenty of range
  • Roger beep tone lets other know when it is clear to talk, reducing the chances of talking over each other
  • 22 channels let you designate channels to specific groups or find your own in crowded areas
  • 10 channel weather radios for current conditions and to stay informed of potential storms
  • Power saver mode puts the radio into standby when not in use, but keeps it ready to receive or transmit
  • Integrated USB charger and 3 AAA rechargeable batteries included. Common, easy to find Alkaline AAA batteries can also be used
  • Includes: 3 ACXT145 2-way radios, 9 x rechargeable AAA batteries (3 per radio), a USB charging cable and manual
name: Cobra ACXT145-3 FRS Walkie-Talkie 3-Pack

specs.value: 3 AAA rechargeable (included) or 3 AAA alkalines (not included)
